meanings.definition: A small apartment consisting of a combined bedroom and sitting room.
meanings.sent1: My friend lives in a bedsit with a bed and a sofa in the same room.
meanings.sent2: The bedsit I visited yesterday had a cozy bedroom area next to a small sitting space.
meanings.sent3: In the bedsit, the bed and sofa were so close together, it felt like a game of furniture Tetris.
meanings.sent4: The bedsit was like a puzzle, fitting both a bedroom and sitting room into one tiny space.
meanings.sent5: The bedsit was a compact living space, combining the functions of a bedroom and a sitting room.

meanings.definition: To rent or live in a bedsit.
meanings.sent1: I decided to bedsit in the city to save money on rent.
meanings.sent2: She bedsits in a small apartment near her workplace.
meanings.sent3: When he bedsits, he enjoys the convenience of having everything in one room.
meanings.sent4: She bedsits like a pro, making the most of the limited space available.
meanings.sent5: Bedsitting allows you to have a bedroom and sitting room in one cozy spot.
